words.l: 要在冬天到来之前，把房顶修好。
words.r: Yào zài dōngtiān dàolái zhīqián, bǎ fáng dǐng xiūhǎo.

words.t: Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
words.l: 洗洗你的手，在你上桌之前。
words.r: Xǐ xǐ nǐ de shǒu, zài nǐ shàng zhuō zhīqián.

words.t: Close the window before you go out.
words.l: 关上窗户，在你外出之前。
words.r: Guānshàng chuānghù, zài nǐ wàichū zhīqián.

words.t: Yes, after the class is over.
words.r: Shì a, děng shàng wán kè.

words.t: After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
words.l: 车祸之后，他不能工作了。

words.t: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
After he went to America, he became rich.
words.l: 去了美国以后，他就变成了富人。
words.r: Qùle měiguó yǐhòu, tā jiù biàn chéngle fù rén.

words.t: Since when is she no longer working?
words.l: 从什么时候起她不工作了？
words.r: cóng shénme shíhòu qǐ tā bù gōngzuòle?

words.t: Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
words.l: 是啊，自从她结婚以后就不再工作了。
words.r: Shì a, zìcóng tā jiéhūn yǐhòu jiù bù zài gōngzuòle.

words.t: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
words.l: 从她结婚以后，就不再工作了。
words.r: Cóng tā jiéhūn yǐhòu, jiù bù zài gōngzuòle.

words.t: Since they have met each other, they are happy.
words.l: 从他们认识以后，他们就很快乐。
words.r: Cóng tāmen rènshí yǐhòu, tāmen jiù hěn kuàilè.

words.t: Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
words.l: 自从他们有了孩子以后，他们就很少外出散步了。
words.r: Zìcóng tāmen yǒule hái zǐ yǐhòu, tāmen jiù hěn shǎo wàichū sànbùle.
Shì a, zài tā kāichē de shíhòu.
Tā biān kāichē biān dǎ diànhuà.

words.t: She watches TV while she irons.
words.r: Tā biān kàn diànshì biān yùn yīfú.

words.t: She listens to music while she does her work.
words.r: Tā biān tīng yīnyuè biān zuò zuo yè.

words.t: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
words.l: 如果我没有眼镜，我就什么也看不见。
words.r: Rúguǒ wǒ méiyǒu yǎnjìng, wǒ jiù shénme yě kàn bùjiàn.

words.t: I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
words.l: 如果音乐太吵，我就听不懂说的什么。
words.r: Rúguǒ yīnyuè tài chǎo, wǒ jiù tīng bù dǒng shuō de shénme.

words.t: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
words.l: 如果我感冒，就什么都闻不到。
words.r: Rúguǒ wǒ gǎnmào, jiù shénme dōu wén bù dào.

words.t: We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
words.l: 如果下雨，我们就乘出租车。
words.r: Rúguǒ xià yǔ, wǒmen jiù chéng chūzū chē.

words.t: We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
words.l: 如果我们中了彩票，就环游世界。
words.r: Rúguǒ wǒmen zhōngle cǎipiào, jiù huán yóu shìjiè.

words.t: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
words.l: 如果他不很快来的话，我们就开始吃饭。
words.r: Rúguǒ tā bù hěn kuài lái dehuà, wǒmen jiù kāishǐ chīfàn.

words.t: I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
words.r: nàozhōng yī xiǎng, wǒ jiù qǐchuáng.

words.t: I become tired as soon as I have to study.
words.r: Wǒ yī xuéxí, jiù huì lèi.

words.t: I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
words.l: 我到60岁的时候，我就不工作了。
words.r: Wǒ dào 60 suì de shíhòu, wǒ jiù bù gōngzuòle.

words.t: As soon as I have a moment.
words.r: Wǒ yī yǒu shíjiān jiù dǎ.

words.t: He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
words.l: 只要他一有时间，就会打电话来。
words.r: Zhǐyào tā yī yǒu shíjiān, jiù huì dǎ diànhuà lái.
Nín jiāngyào gōngzuò duō cháng shíjiān?

words.t: I’ll work as long as I can.
words.l: 只要我还能，我就一直工作。
words.r: Zhǐyào wǒ hái néng, wǒ jiù yīzhí gōngzuò.

words.t: I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
words.l: 只要我身体健康，我就要一直工作。
words.r: Zhǐyào wǒ shēntǐ jiànkāng, wǒ jiù yào yīzhí gōngzuò.

words.t: He lies in bed instead of working.
words.l: 他不工作，而是躺在床上。
words.r: Tā bù gōngzuò, ér shì tǎng zài chuángshàng.

words.t: She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
words.l: 她没有做饭，却在读报纸。
words.r: Tā méiyǒu zuò fàn, què zàidú bàozhǐ.

words.t: He is at the bar instead of going home.
words.l: 他没有回家，却坐在酒吧里。
words.r: Tā méiyǒu huí jiā, què zuò zài jiǔbā lǐ.

words.t: As far as I know, he lives here.
words.r: Jiù wǒ suǒ zhī, tā zhù zài zhè'er.

words.t: As far as I know, his wife is ill.
words.l: 就我所知，他的妻子病了。
words.r: Jiù wǒ suǒ zhī, tā de qīzi bìngle.

words.t: As far as I know, he is unemployed.
words.r: Jiù wǒ suǒ zhī, tā shīyèle.

words.t: I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
words.l: 我那时睡过头了，要不就能准时了 。
words.r: Wǒ nà shí shuì guòtóule, yào bù jiù néng zhǔnshíliǎo.

words.t: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
words.l: 我那时错过了公共汽车，要不就能准时了。
words.r: Wǒ nà shí cuòguòle gōnggòng qìchē, yào bù jiù néng zhǔnshíliǎo.

words.t: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
words.l: 我那时没有找到路, 要不就能准时了。
words.r: Wǒ nà shí méiyǒu zhǎodào lù, yào bù jiù néng zhǔnshíliǎo.

words.t: He fell asleep although the TV was on.
words.l: 他睡着了，虽然电视还开着。
words.r: tā shuìzhele, suīrán diànshì hái kāizhe.

words.t: He stayed a while although it was late.
words.l: 他还没走，虽然已经很晚了。
words.r: Tā hái méi zǒu, suīrán yǐjīng hěn wǎnle.

words.t: He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
words.l: 他没有来，尽管我们约好了。
words.r: Tā méiyǒu lái, jǐnguǎn wǒmen yuē hǎole.

words.t: The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
words.l: 电视开着呢, 他却仍然睡着了。
words.r: Diànshì kāi zhene, tā què réngrán shuìzhele.

words.t: It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
words.l: 已经很晚了, 他仍然还没走。
words.r: Yǐjīng hěn wǎnle, tā réngrán hái méi zǒu.

words.t: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
words.l: 我们已经约好了, 他仍然没有来。
words.r: Wǒmen yǐjīng yuē hǎole, tā réngrán méiyǒu lái.

words.t: Although he has no license, he drives the car.
words.l: 尽管他没有驾驶执照, 他仍然开车。
words.r: Jǐnguǎn tā méiyǒu jiàshǐ zhízhào, tā réngrán kāichē.

words.t: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
words.l: 尽管路面滑，他仍然开得很快。
words.r: Jǐnguǎn lùmiàn huá, tā réngrán kāi dé hěn kuài.

words.t: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
words.l: 尽管他喝醉了，他仍骑自行车。
words.r: Jǐnguǎn tā hē zuìle, tā réng qí zìxíngchē.

words.t: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
words.l: 他没有驾驶执照, 却仍然开车。
words.r: Tā méiyǒu jiàshǐ zhízhào, què réngrán kāichē.

words.t: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
words.l: 路面很滑，他仍然开得这么快。
words.r: Lùmiàn hěn huá, tā réngrán kāi dé zhème kuài.

words.t: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
words.l: 他喝醉了，但却仍然骑自行车。
words.r: Tā hē zuìle, dàn què réngrán qí zìxíngchē.

words.t: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
words.l: 她没有找到工作，尽管她上过大学。
words.r: Tā méiyǒu zhǎodào gōngzuò, jǐnguǎn tā shàng guo dàxué.

words.t: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
words.l: 她不去看医生，尽管她疼痛。
words.r: Tā bù qù kàn yīshēng, jǐnguǎn tā téngtòng.

words.t: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
words.l: 她买了一辆车，尽管她没钱。
words.r: Tā mǎile yī liàng chē, jǐnguǎn tā méi qián.

words.t: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
words.l: 她上过大学，但她仍然没找到工作。
words.r: Tā shàng guo dàxué, dàn tā réngrán méi zhǎodào gōngzuò.

words.t: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
words.l: 她很痛，但她仍然不去看医生
words.r: Tā hěn tòng, dàn tā réngrán bù qù kàn yīshēng

words.t: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
words.r: tā méi qián, dàn tā réngrán mǎi chē.

words.t: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
words.l: 这次旅游虽然很好，但是太累人了。
words.r: zhè cì lǚyóu suīrán hěn hǎo, dànshì tài lèi rénle.

words.t: The train was on time, but too full.
words.l: 这趟火车虽然很准时，但是太满了。
words.r: Zhè tàng huǒchē suīrán hěn zhǔnshí, dànshì tài mǎnle.

words.t: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
words.l: 这家宾馆虽然很舒服，但是太贵了。
words.r: Zhè jiā bīnguǎn suīrán hěn shūfú, dànshì tài guìle.

words.t: He’ll take either the bus or the train.
words.l: 他不是坐公共汽车就是坐火车。
words.r: Tā bùshì zuò gōnggòng qìchē jiùshì zuò huǒchē.

words.t: He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
words.l: 他不是今天晚上来就是明天早上来。
words.r: Tā bùshì jīntiān wǎnshàng lái jiùshì míngtiān zǎoshang lái.

words.t: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
words.l: 他或者住在我家或者是住宾馆。
words.r: Tā huòzhě zhù zài wǒjiā huòzhě shì zhù bīnguǎn.

words.t: She speaks Spanish as well as English.
words.l: 她不仅说西班牙语而且也说英语。
words.r: Tā bùjǐn shuō xībānyá yǔ érqiě yě shuō yīngyǔ.

words.t: She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
words.l: 她不仅在马德里生活过而且也在伦敦生活过。
words.r: Tā bùjǐn zài mǎdélǐ shēnghuóguò érqiě yě zài lúndūn shēnghuóguò.

words.t: She knows Spain as well as England.
words.l: 她不仅了解西班牙而且也了解英格兰。
words.r: Tā bùjǐn liǎojiě xībānyá érqiě yě liǎojiě yīnggélán.

words.t: He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
words.l: 她不仅漂亮，而且也聪明。
words.r: Tā bùjǐn piàoliang, érqiě yě cōngmíng.

words.t: She speaks not only German, but also French.
words.l: 她不只说德语，而且还说法语。
words.r: Tā bù zhǐ shuō déyǔ, érqiě hái shuō fǎyǔ.

words.t: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
words.l: 我既不会弹钢琴也不会弹吉他。
words.r: Wǒ jì bù huì dàn gāngqín yě bù huì dàn jítā.

words.t: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
words.l: 我既不会跳华尔兹也不会跳桑巴舞。
words.r: Wǒ jì bù huì tiào huá'ěrzī yě bù huì tiào sāng bā wǔ.

words.t: I like neither opera nor ballet.
words.l: 我既不喜欢歌剧也不喜欢芭蕾。
words.r: Wǒ jì bù xǐhuān gējù yě bù xǐhuān bālěi.

words.t: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
words.l: 你工作越快，就越早完成。
words.r: Nǐ gōngzuò yuè kuài, jiù yuè zǎo wánchéng.

words.t: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
words.l: 你来的越早，你就可以走的越早。
words.r: Nǐ lái de yuè zǎo, nǐ jiù kě yǐ zǒu de yuè zǎo.

words.t: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
words.l: 人越老，就越想生活的舒适。
words.r: Rén yuè lǎo, jiù yuè xiǎng shēnghuó de shūshì.
zhè shì wǒ nán tóngshì de dàyī.
Zhè shì wǒ nǚ tóngshì de jū.
Zhè shì wǒ tóngshì de gōngzuò.

words.t: The button from the shirt is gone.
words.l: 这衣服上的扣子掉下来了。
words.r: Zhè yīfú shàng de kòuzi diào xiàláile.

words.t: The boss’ computer is not working.

words.l: 谁是这个女孩儿的父母？
words.r: Shuí shì zhège nǚhái ér de fùmǔ?

words.t: How do I get to her parents’ house?
words.r: Wǒ zěnyàng qù tā fùmǔ jiā?

words.t: The house is at the end of the road.
words.l: 房子就在这条街的尽头。
words.r: Fángzi jiù zài zhè tiáo jiē de jìntóu.

words.t: What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
words.l: 瑞士的首都叫什么名字？
words.r: Ruìshì dì shǒudū jiào shénme míngzì?

words.t: What is the title of the book?
words.r: Zhè shū jiào shénme míng er?

words.t: What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?
words.l: 邻居家的小孩子叫什么名字？
words.r: Línjū jiā de xiǎo háizi jiào shénme míngzì?

words.l: 孩子们的假期是什么时候？
words.r: Háizi men de jiàqī shì shénme shíhòu?

words.t: What are the doctor’s consultation times?
What time is the museum open?

words.l: 已经一次 – 从来没有

words.t: Have you already been to Berlin?

words.l: 某人，有人 – 无人，没有人
words.r: Mǒu rén, yǒurén – wú rén, méiyǒurén

words.l: 您在这儿有认识的人吗？
words.r: nín zài zhè'er yǒu rènshí de rén ma?

words.t: No, I don’t know anyone here.
words.r: Bù, wǒ zài zhè'er bù rènshí rén.

words.t: a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
words.l: 您还要在这里呆很久吗？
words.r: nín hái yào zài zhèlǐ dāi hěnjiǔ ma?

words.t: No, I won’t stay here much longer.
words.r: Bù, zhèlǐ wǒ bù zài duō dāile.

words.t: Would you like to drink something else?
words.r: nín hái yào hē diǎn shénme ma?

words.t: No, I don’t want anything else.
No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.
words.l: 还没，我还什么都没吃呢
words.r: Hái méi, wǒ hái shénme dōu méi chī ne

words.t: Does anyone else want a coffee?
words.r: hái yǒu rén yào kāfēi ma?
